IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: OUR MISSION IS TO CHANGE THE WAY EDUCATION MEETS THE FUTURE; TO FOSTER INTERDISCIPLINARY, INTEGRATED THINKING AND INNOVATIVE LEADERSHIP; TO ENGAGE FULLY IN THE GLOBAL COMMUNITY; AND TO FACILITATE LIFELONG LEARNING.
IRS990.MissionDescription: OUR MISSION IS TO CHANGE THE WAY EDUCATION MEETS THE FUTURE; TO FOSTER INTERDISCIPLINARY, INTEGRATED THINKING AND INNOVATIVE LEADERSHIP; TO ENGAGE FULLY IN THE GLOBAL COMMUNITY; AND TO FACILITATE LIFELONG LEARNING.
IRS990.Description: EDUCATION OF STUDENTS IN PRE-NURSERY TO PRE-K, AND GRADES K - 12.

Activity2.Description: RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT OF INNOVATIVE CURRICULUM PLANS IN ORDER TO PREPARE STUDENTS FOR THE 21ST CENTURY.

Activity3.Description: PROVIDING PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT FOR SCHOOLS THAT WOULD LIKE TO ADOPT THE ROSS MODEL, GROWING OUR WORLDWIDE COMMUNITY OF ROSS SCHOOLS THAT ARE COMMITTED TO 21ST CENTURY EDUCATION AND CATALYZING RESEARCH IN ORDER TO IMPROVE PEDAGOGICAL PRACTICE.

ActivityOther.Description: DEVELOPMENT AND UTILIZATION OF TECHNOLOGY FOR EDUCATION IN AN EDUCATIONAL ENVIRONMENT.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Identifier: COLLECTIONS AND RELATION TO EXEMPT PURPOSE
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART III, LINE 4
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: THE ARTWORK MAINTAINED BY THE ROSS INSTITUTE IS UTILIZED FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES AND IS INTEGRATED INTO THE CURRICULUM.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: EACH FISCAL YEAR, THE INSTITUTE IS AUTHORIZED TO EXPEND FROM THE SCHOLARSHIP FUND (ENDOWMENT) AN AMOUNT EQUAL TO FOUR AND ONE-HALF PERCENT OF THE PRINCIPAL OF THE ENDOWMENT AS OF THE FIRST BUSINESS DAY OF SUCH YEAR, OR SUCH OTHER AMOUNT AS SHALL BE MUTUALLY AGREED UPON BY THE DONOR OR THE DONOR'S DESIGNATED REPRESENTATIVES AND THE ROSS SCHOOL. THE ENDOWMENT PAYOUT SHALL BE PAID FIRST FROM THE INCOME OF THE ENDOWMENT AND, IF AND TO THE EXTENT THAT SUCH INCOME IS INSUFFICIENT, FROM THE PRINCIPAL OF THE ENDOWMENT. IF THE INCOME OF THE ENDOWMENT IN ANY FISCAL YEAR EXCEEDS THE AUTHORIZED PAYOUT AMOUNT FOR SUCH YEAR, THE EXCESS WILL BE ADDED TO PRINCIPAL AT THE END OF SUCH FISCAL YEAR. THE ENDOWMENT PAYOUT FOR EACH FISCAL YEAR SHALL BE USED TO AWARD SCHOLARSHIPS TO HELP SUPPORT THE TUITION FOR ONE OR MORE STUDENTS AT THE INSTITUTE ENTERING THE NINTH GRADE WHO HAVE EXHIBITED A DEEP INTEREST IN OR ENJOYMENT OF THE ARTS AND/OR SCIENCES, ESPECIALLY THE ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCES, AND WHO ARE ELIGIBLE ON A NEEDS BASIS FOR FINANCIAL AID AT THE INSTITUTE.

THE INSTITUTES CURRENT ACCOUNTING POLICY IS TO DISCLOSE LIABILITIES FOR UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS WHEN A LIABILITY IS PROBABLE AND ESTIMABLE. MANAGEMENT IS NOT AWARE OF ANY VIOLATION OF ITS TAX STATUS AS AN ORGANIZATION EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XI, LINE 8
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: GAIN ON WRITE-OFF OF INTEREST PAYABLE 162,839 FINANCIAL AID -3,133,999 RENTAL EXPENSE 233,906 WRITE-OFF OF OLD PREPAID EXPENSES -195,896 RENTAL EXPENSE -233,906 FINANCIAL AID 3,133,999 BOOK / TAX DEPRECIATION DIFFERENCE 32,361

IRS990ScheduleE.PubViaBroadcastMediaExpln: SEE SCHEDULE O ROSS INSTITUTE FOLLOWS A RACIALLY NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY AS TO STUDENTS IN ITS PROGRAMS. THE INSTITUTE'S PROMOTIONAL ACTIVITIES FOR ITS PROGRAMS ARE DESIGNED TO INFORM ALL RACIAL SEGMENTS IN THE GENERAL COMMUNITIES WITHIN THE AREA OF THE AVAILABILITY OF THE INSTITUTE. A CLAUSE IS INCLUDED IN THE ADMISSIONS CATALOG AND ON ITS WEBSITE.

AcctsActvsOutUSTable.Region: RUSSIA AND THE NEWLY INDEPENDENT STATES

Form990ScheduleFPartIV.Identifier: PROCEDURES FOR MONITORING THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES
Form990ScheduleFPartIV.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE F, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
Form990ScheduleFPartIV.Explanation: IN DETERMINING WHETHER A GRANT SHOULD BE MADE BY THE ROSS INSTITUTE (THE "ORGANIZATION") TO A FOREIGN ORGANIZATION, THE FOLLOWING PROCEDURES SHALL BE FOLLOWED: (1) THE MAKING OF GRANTS AND CONTRIBUTIONS AND OTHERWISE RENDERING FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE FOR PURPOSES EXPRESSED IN THE CHARTER OF THE ORGANIZATION SHALL BE WITHIN THE EXCLUSIVE POWER OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES (THE "BOARD"); (2) IN FURTHERANCE OF THE ORGANIZATIONS PURPOSES, THE BOARD SHALL HAVE POWER TO MAKE GRANTS TO ANY FOREIGN ORGANIZATION ORGANIZED AND OPERATED EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE, SCIENTIFIC, OR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES WITHIN THE MEANING OF SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OF 1986, AS EMENDED (THE "CODE"); (3) THE BOARD SHALL REVIEW ALL REQUESTS FOR FUNDS FROM SUCH FOREIGN ORGANIZATIONS, SHALL REQUIRE THAT SUCH REQUESTS SPECIFY THE USE TO WHICH THE FUNDS WILL BE PUT, AND, IF THE BOARD APPROVES THE REQUEST, SHALL AUTHORIZE PAYMENT OF SUCH FUNDS TO THE APPROVED GRANTEE; (4) THE BOARD SHALL REQUIRE THAT THE GRANTEES FURNISH PERIODIC ACCOUNTINGS TO DEMONSTRATE THAT THE FUNDS WERE EXPENDED FOR THE PURPOSES WHICH WERE APPROVED BY THE BOARD; AND (5) THE BOARD MAY, IN ITS ABSOLUTE DISCRETION, REFUSE TO MAKE ANY GRANTS OR CONTRIBUTIONS OR OTHERWISE RENDER FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO OR FOR ANY OR ALL PURPOSES FOR WHICH FUNDS ARE REQUESTED.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: PROCEDURES FOR MONITORING THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS INSIDE THE UNITED STATES
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: ROSS INSTITUTE REVIEWS ALL EXPENDITURES FOR WHICH ITS GRANTS AND SCHOLARSHIPS ARE INTENDED TO PAY.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE J, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 1A
Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: THE HEAD OF SCHOOL RECEIVED HOUSING ESTIMATED AT A FAIR MARKET VALUE OF 8,000.

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION'S CHARTER WAS AMENDED TO CHANGE ITS NAME FROM "THE ROSS SCHOOL" TO "ROSS INSTITUTE" ON MARCH 9, 2010. THE ORGANIZATION HAS FILED A D/B/A WITH NEW YORK STATE FOR USE OF THE NAME "THE ROSS SCHOOL." (FOR ADDITIONAL DETAIL, PLEASE SEE THE RESPONSE TO PART VI, LINE 4). PER INSTRUCTIONS FROM THE IRS, THIS RETURN IS BEING FILED UNDER THE NAME "THE ROSS SCHOOL" FOR THE 2009-2010 TAX YEAR, PENDING IRS PROCESSING OF THE CHANGE OF THE ORGANIZATION'S NAME.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ANY SIGNIFICANT NEW PROGRAM SERVICES NOT LISTED ON A PRIOR RETURN

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: DEVELOPMENT AND UTILIZATION OF TECHNOLOGY FOR EDUCATION IN AN EDUCATIONAL ENVIRONMENT.
COURTNEY SALE ROSS NICOLE ROSS PRESIDENT TRUSTEE MOTHER - DAUGHTER

THE ORGANIZATION'S CHARTER WAS AMENDED TO CHANGE ITS NAME FROM "THE ROSS SCHOOL" TO "ROSS INSTITUTE" ON MARCH 9, 2010. THE ORGANIZATION HAS FILED A D/B/A WITH NEW YORK STATE FOR USE OF THE NAME "THE ROSS SCHOOL." A COPY OF THE AMENDMENT OF CHARTER, DATED MARCH 9, 2010, IS ATTACHED. ADDITIONALLY, BY THE SAME AMENDMENT OF CHARTER, THE ORGANIZATION HAS ADDED TO ITS PURPOSES THE FOLLOWING: "TO FOSTER EDUCATIONAL RESEARCH WORLDWIDE AND DEVELOP, IMPLEMENT AND DISSEMINATE INNOVATIVE CURRICULAR, PEDAGOGICAL METHODS AND THEORIES AND BEST PRACTICES IN EDUCATION." THESE PURPOSES WERE ADDED TO THE ORGANIZATION'S CHARTER IN CONNECTION WITH THE TRANSFER TO THE ORGANIZATION OF ALL OF THE ASSETS AND LIABILITIES OF THE ROSS INSTITUTE FOR ADVANCED STUDY AND INNOVATION IN EDUCATION, AN ORGANIZATION RECOGNIZED BY THE IRS AS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXATION UNDER INTERNAL REVENUE CODE SECTION 501(C)(3). ADDITIONALLY, THE ORGANIZATION AMENDED ITS CHARTER ON DECEMBER 18, 2008, TO ADD THE FOLLOWING PURPOSES: "TO ESTABLISH, OPERATE AND MAINTAIN SUPPLEMENTAL, NON-CREDIT PROGRAMS AND SERVICES FOR THE EDUCATION, RECREATION AND GENERAL WELFARE OF THE COMMUNITY AT LARGE, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO COURSES IN EDUCATION, PEDAGOGY, TECHNOLOGY, FINE AND PERFORMING ARTS, SCIENCES AND HUMANITIES, WELLNESS AND SPORTS; AND TO MAKE AVAILABLE IN CONNECTION THEREWITH, THE ACADEMIC AND ATHLETIC FACILITIES OF THE SCHOOL, AT SUCH TIMES WHEN SUCH FACILITIES ARE NOT IN USE FOR SCHOOL PURPOSES IF, IN THE OPINION OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES, SUCH USE WILL NOT BE DISRUPTIVE OF NORMAL SCHOOL OPERATIONS."

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A PRELIMINARY DRAFT OF THE ORGANIZATION'S FORM 990, INCLUDING ALL REQUIRED SCHEDULES WAS PROVIDED TO MANAGEMENT. THE MANAGEMENT REVIEWED THE DRAFT FORM 990 AND CONSULTED WITH THE ORGANIZATION'S ACCOUNTANTS, TAX RETURN PREPARERS, AND TAX COUNSEL, AND TOOK ALL OTHER MEASURES NECESSARY AND APPROPRIATE TO ENSURE THAT THE FINAL VERSION OF THE FORM 990 IS COMPLETE AND ACCURATE TO THE BEST OF THEIR KNOWLEDGE. A COPY OF THE FINAL VERSION OF THE FORM 990,INCLUDING ALL REQUIRED SCHEDULES, WILL BE PROVIDED TO EACH MEMBER OF THE ORGANIZATION'S BOARD OF TRUSTEES AFTER FILING THEREOF WITH THE IRS.

THE ORGANIZATION FOLLOWS PROCEDURES TO DETERMINE THE NAMES OF ANY PERSONS WHO MIGHT HAVE A FINANCIAL INTEREST OR POSSIBLE CONFLICT OF INTEREST IN ANY TRANSACTION. OTHER THAN RELATED PARTY ITEMS DISCLOSED IN THIS FORM 990, THERE WERE NO CONFLICTS OF INTEREST.

THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES APPROVES THE HEAD OF SCHOOL'S COMPENSATION BY PERFORMING AN ANALYSIS AND UTILIZING APPROPRIATE DATA AS TO THE COMPARABILITY OF THE COMPENSATION. THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE IS REQUIRED TO ADEQUATELY DOCUMENT THE BASIS FOR ITS DETERMINATIONS.

THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES APPROVES THE COMPENSATION OF OTHER OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES BY PERFORMING AN ANALYSIS AND UTILIZING APPROPRIATE DATA AS TO THE COMPARABILITY OF THE COMPENSATION. THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE IS REQUIRED TO ADEQUATELY DOCUMENT THE BASIS FOR ITS DETERMINATIONS.
THE SCHOOL MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: PUBLICATION OF NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY IN MEDIA EXPLANATION
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ROSS INSTITUTE FOLLOWS A RACIALLY NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY AS TO STUDENTS IN ITS PROGRAMS. THE INSTITUTE'S PROMOTIONAL ACTIVITIES FOR ITS PROGRAMS ARE DESIGNED TO INFORM ALL RACIAL SEGMENTS IN THE GENERAL COMMUNITIES WITHIN THE AREA OF THE AVAILABILITY OF THE INSTITUTE. A CLAUSE IS INCLUDED IN THE ADMISSIONS CATALOG AND ON ITS WEBSITE.

FORM 990, PART I, LINE 22 / SCHEDULE R, PART V, TRANSACTIONS WITH RELATED ORGANIZATIONS - IN CONNECTION WITH THE CHANGES TO THE ORGANIZATION DESCRIBED IN SCHEDULE O WITH RESPECT TO FORM 990, PART VI, LINE 4 - SIGNIFICANT CHANGES TO ORGANIZATIONAL DOCUMENTS, THE BOARDS OF TRUSTEES OF THE ORGANIZATION AND OF THE ROSS INSTITUTE FOR ADVANCED STUDY AND INNOVATION IN EDUCATION ("RIA") (A RELATED ORGANIZATION THAT HAS BEEN RECOGNIZED BY THE IRS AS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXATION UNDER CODE SECTION 501(C)(3)) AGREED TO THE TRANSFER OF ALL ASSETS, LIABILITIES AND ACTIVITIES FROM RIA TO THE ORGANIZATION. THIS TRANSFER WAS ACCOUNTED FOR USING THE POOLING OF INTEREST METHOD AND RESULTED IN A DECREASE IN THE BEGINNING UNRESTRICTED NET ASSETS OF THE ORGANIZATION OF 3,441,394. NET ASSETS (DEFICIT) OF (3,441,394) WERE TRANSFERRED TO THE INSTITUTE AS FOLLOWS: CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS 312,886 ACCOUNTS RECEIVABLE 180,586 PREPAID EXPENSES 14,094 OTHER ASSETS DEPOSITS AND ADVANCES 22,023 FURNITURE, FIXTURES, AND EQUIPMENT (NET OF ACCUMULATED DEPRECIATION) 734,068 ACCOUNTS PAYABLE AND ACCRUED EXPENSES (1,040,149) ACCRUED SALARIES (12,488) LOANS PAYABLE (3,385,984) ACCRUED INTEREST PAYABLE (162,839) PAYABLE TO ROSS SCHOOL (103,591) TOTAL (3,441,394)
